name: Upstasis
description:
Upstasis is a game made for Beginner's Circle #3 game jam! You play as Pamparo, an alien thrown out his civilization because of his differences. Pamparo will get his revenge! This game was made in two weeks by 4 people! We are happy at how the game turned out and will probably improve it after the game jam!

Any feedback and bug reports are appreciated!
